Question: Shenzhen Besiter Power Bank Co. Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Besiter Power Bank Co. Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Besiter successfully held the "Global New Product Conference of Shared Energy Storage Power Supply" in Shenzhen, China, unveiling the world's first shared energy storage power supply.
- The conference focused on promoting high-quality development of the shared energy storage power industry, with discussions on the opportunity of the era of energy storage power and industrial upgrading by technological transformation.
- The shared energy storage power supply offers three advantages: more efficient dispatching operation, large-scale procurement of energy storage equipment, and sustainable commercial operation path.
- The product combines safety, intelligence, and sharing, featuring advanced intelligent technology, remote control capabilities, and a new sharing model SAAS service platform.
- The company aims to create a profitable shared energy source and build a closed-loop ecological development circle.
- Besiter's Chairman emphasized the corporate mission of altruistic culture, providing high-quality products and services, and making contributions to the popularization and convenience of shared charging for mankind.

For more details, please visit: www.besiter.com.hk
